sentences.en: A usually coarse - grained igneous rock composed chiefly of calcic plagioclase and pyroxene.
sentences.cn: 一种辉石矿物,由锂铝硅酸盐组成,是锂的来源.

sentences.en: Contrast the formation of intrusive and extrusive igneous rocks.
sentences.cn: 对比形成的侵扰和挤压火成岩.

sentences.en: Dr. Matter is involved in another similar study of peridotite, an igneous rock, where it occurs in a large formation in the Middle Eastern country of Oman.
sentences.cn: 马特博士还参与了另一项在中东国家阿曼进行的、与此相似的火成岩橄榄岩研究。

sentences.en: I wonder if there are further classifications of igneous rocks.
sentences.cn: 我想知道火成岩还有进一步的类型划分吗?

sentences.en: Igneous drape reservoir is a special type of reservoir.
sentences.cn: 火成岩披覆油藏是一种特殊的油藏类型.

sentences.en: Igneous rocks do not contain fossils.
Self - organization map were used to identify lithology of the igneous formations. Good results archived.
sentences.cn: 并利用自组织神经网络方法识别岩性,取得了良好的效果.

sentences.en: So eruption of volcanoes is one way of producing igneous rocks.
sentences.cn: 那么火山喷发是形成火山岩的一种方式罗.

sentences.en: Speaking of volcanoes , man, are they a violent igneous rock formation!
sentences.cn: 是啊, 像火山一样.可怕的火成岩构成.

sentences.en: The earth movements associated with the orogeny triggered an extensive igneous activity.
sentences.cn: 伴随着造山运动的地壳运动出发了一场广泛的火成活动。

sentences.en: The Great Dyke of Zimbabwe is a layered mafic intrusion of igneous, metal-bearing rock that has been dated to approximately 2.5 billion years old.
sentences.cn: 津巴布韦大堤是一个分层的火成岩，金属镁铁质侵入岩轴承已追溯到大约2.5亿年的历史。

sentences.en: The intrusion sequence for igneous rocks is indicated by crosscutting and inclusion relationships.
sentences.cn: 火成岩的归入顺序由切割和包含关系来表示.

sentences.en: The LIP ( large igneous province ) is the best exhibition when the.
sentences.cn: 大火成岩省 ( LIP ) 是地幔柱到达地表最好的表现形式.

sentences.en: The most common intrusive in the order of igneous rocks is granite.
sentences.cn: 在火成岩系列中最常见的侵入体是花岗岩.

sentences.en: The rocks here are igneous and do not fracture along predictable lines.
sentences.cn: 这儿的石头都是火成岩,石头的裂缝极不规则.

sentences.en: Thus the intrusive igneous rocks usually have a coarse texture.
sentences.cn: 所以侵入岩通常具有粗粒结构.

sentences.en: Trap rock is a form of plutonic igneous rock.
When molten rock cools igneous rocks form.
sentences.cn: 当熔融岩石冷却,火成岩形成.

trans.tran_en: igneous rocks are formed from lava(= hot liquid rock )
